item.description:
By popular demand!!!

Event Organizer Laura Kaplan has made arrangements for us to have a large table at Zen in Northampton on Tuesday, March 16th. There is a small $5.00 reservation charge to hold your place and then you are welcome to order what you like off the menu. We will have something special for you at the restaurant.

Be there or be... [Zen philosophy, get it? Never mind.]

Super easy to find, Zen is right on the main drag of NoHo at 41 Main St. a few doors up from Fitzwilly's.

If you'd like to check out the menu:

Zen Dinner Menu

Here's what people are saying around the 'net:

Yelp

TripAdvisor

UrbanSpoon

ChowHound

mixed reviews for sure, but it's been our member favorite, weighing in at 10 resounding YES!es for people's request. Anyway, whenever we get together, it's riotous silly fun, so why not give it a try?

Have fun!
item.how_to_find_us: we will be the ones laughing the loudest
item.name: Zen: it's a philosophy and what's for dinner
